segments.advisor_message: Alright, so to start off, you mentioned that you have an investment bond with a value of, uh, about fifteen thousand pounds, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's right! It's a bond I got a while back. Um, I think it's through, uh, Royal Bank or something?

segments.advisor_message: Got it, and you said it's with Royal Bank. Also, you mentioned that this investment bond is, um, supposed to mature in a few years?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's right! I should get my, um, returns by then, I hope!

segments.advisor_message: Sounds good! So to recap, your investment bond is with Royal Bank, it's, uh, valued at around fifteen thousand pounds, and you’re expecting your returns in a few years. Did I miss anything?
segments.client_message: No, that covers it! Oh, and I've also been thinking about maybe putting some more into a, um, ISA later on.
